parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description: The username of the account that is used to log on to the host of the instance.

parameters.name: AccountPassword
parameters.description: The password of the host account.

parameters.name: HostName
parameters.description: The instance hostname. You can call the DescribeDBInstanceIpHostname operation to query the hostname.

parameters.name: RegionID
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the DescribeDBInstanceAttribute operation to query the region ID.
